job_title: Instrument Coordinator/Central Service Technician in New London, CT
pros: Working at Lawrence and Memorial Hospital was wonderful. Working with the Doctors,nurses,surgical tech's,central service tech's and sales rep's.Also being sure that all the surgical cases where perfect for the patients.
cons: Management would be hard on their employers. Sometimes there was a lot of favoritism. Also trying to do your best and then being put down by your manager.

review_title: Great place to be a leader
job_title: Director in New London, CT
pros: Autonomy, flexibility, great senior leadership, focused on personal accountability, supportive environment allows leaders to motivate teams to achieve great outcomes
cons: Somewhat reactive rather than proactive responses to some challenges. Some challenging culture to overcome in some areas of the hospital. Medical staff sometimes difficult to “wrangle” and at times not striving to achieve same goals as others on the team.

job_title: Registered Nurse in Groton, CT
pros: Very excellent and competitive pay which justifies the heavy workload. Nice shift, weekend, and overtime differentials. Good communication through emails.
cons: Staffing and management. Too many policies that is ever changing. Being short staffed is okay and common, but being overstaffed is taboo. Acuity can be too much if you have a bad assignment and you have 6+ patients.

review_title: I have learned a lot on my own.... no room for advancement or education

pros: The money is the  in the stateZ base pay is good plus lots of differentials, weekend pay, premium pay , holiday pay, time and half
